data.message: ...IM A BACKER!! It only takes a couple of minutes to check out and to become a backer and every penny counts!! ... We need backers for 1 chance clothing. We just teamed up with http://www.kickstarter.com/ and have a huge opportunity but only with your help. Just type in the search bar 1 chance clothing and check our video out. After that, Please make a pledge if you can! Every penny counts. And when you chose a specific pledge, you will be contacted for your size and clothing preference at the end of this month, so don't forget to check out the 1 Chance Clothing website http://www.1chanceclothing.com/ and get acquainted with the designs, the staff, and start thinking about what your going to do with your.... 1 Chance!! So thanks and please help share this with your friends and family! (25 days left!)
